means: 嫁，娶，（与…）结婚( wed的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She clings to a romantic fantasy of wedded bliss.
sentence.Network_cn: 她沉醉于婚后幸福的浪漫幻想。

sentence.Network_en: Conservationists are mostly wedded to preserving diversity in nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 自然环境保护主义者大多致力于保持物种的多样性。

sentence.Network_en: He proposed she become his lawfully wedded wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他请求她做他的合法妻子。

entry.def: If you are wedded to something such as an idea, you support it so strongly or like it so much that you are unable to give it up.

example.ex: Conservationists are mostly wedded to preserving diversity in nature.
example.tran: 自然环境保护主义者大多致力于保持物种的多样性。

entry.def: Wedded means the same as married .

example.ex: He proposed she become his lawfully wedded wife...
example.tran: 他请求她做他的合法妻子。

example.ex: She clings to a romantic fantasy of wedded bliss.
example.tran: 她沉醉于婚后幸福的浪漫幻想。
